deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title SmartTokenLib
 @dev This library provides functionality which is required from a regulatory perspective.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "signature/hash does not recover from address"

arguments.value: signature/hash does not recover from address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "signature/hash does not recover from address"

devdoc.details: This library provides functionality which is required from a regulatory perspective.

Recovered(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when the contract owner recovers tokens.

recover(TokenStorage,address,address,byt.details: Recovers tokens from an address and reissues them to another address. In case a user loses its private key the tokens can be recovered by burning the tokens from that address and reissuing to a new address. To recover tokens the contract owner needs to provide a signature proving that the token owner has authorized the owner to do so.

params.h: Hash which the token owner signed.

validate(SmartTokenLib.SmartStorage stor.details: Approves or rejects a transfer request. The request is forwarded to a validator which implements the actual business logic.

devdoc.title: SmartTokenLib
